description: You can create various types of drawings with MyDraw. Examples include data flow diagrams, infographics, hierarchy charts, mind maps, Venn diagrams, family trees, and timelines.
When designing a diagram with MyDraw, you can insert stencils from libraries via the Library browser. MyDraw comes pre-installed with libraries, but you may also create them.

To create an NLB file, select the library icon in the Library browser, choose Save Library As... , then select the NLB format. You can also save MyDraw libraries as .NLX files, which is an XML-based format.
